00022 #pragma once
00023 
00024 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00025 #include <thrust/device_ptr.h>
00026 #include <thrust/device_reference.h>
00027 #include <thrust/device_new.h>
00028 #include <thrust/device_delete.h>
00029 #include <limits>
00030 #include <stdexcept>
00031 
00032 namespace thrust
00033 {
00034 
00048 template<typename T>
00049   class device_new_allocator
00050 {
00051   public:
00052     typedef T                                 value_type;
00053     typedef device_ptr<T>                     pointer;
00054     typedef device_ptr<const T>               const_pointer;
00055     typedef device_reference<T>               reference;
00056     typedef device_reference<const T>         const_reference;
00057     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00058     typedef typename pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00059 
00060     // convert a device_new_allocator<T> to device_new_allocator<U>
00061     template<typename U>
00062       struct rebind
00063     {
00064       typedef device_new_allocator<U> other;
00065     }; // end rebind
00066 
00067     __host__ __device__
00068     inline device_new_allocator() {}
00069 
00070     __host__ __device__
00071     inline ~device_new_allocator() {}
00072 
00073     __host__ __device__
00074     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator const&) {}
00075 
00076     template<typename U>
00077     __host__ __device__
00078     inline device_new_allocator(device_new_allocator<U> const&) {}
00079 
00080     // address
00081     __host__ __device__
00082     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00083     
00084     __host__ __device__
00085     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00086 
00087     // memory allocation
00088     __host__
00089     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00090                             const_pointer = const_pointer(static_cast<T*>(0)))
00091     {
00092       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00093       {
00094         throw std::bad_alloc();
00095       } // end if
00096 
00097       // use "::operator new" rather than keyword new
00098       return pointer(device_new<T>(cnt));
00099     } // end allocate()
00100 
00101     __host__
00102     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00103     {
00104       // use "::operator delete" rather than keyword delete
00105       device_delete(p);
00106     } // end deallocate()
00107 
00108     __host__ __device__
00109     inline size_type max_size() const
00110     {
00111       return std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max THRUST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION () / sizeof(T);
00112     } // end max_size()
00113 
00114     __host__ __device__
00115     inline bool operator==(device_new_allocator const&) { return true; }
00116 
00117     __host__ __device__
00118     inline bool operator!=(device_new_allocator const &a) {return !operator==(a); }
00119 }; // end device_new_allocator
00120 
00124 } // end thrust
